orestes.bloomfilter.redis

Class BloomFilterRedis<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • orestes.bloomfilter.BloomFilter<T>
      • orestes.bloomfilter.redis.BloomFilterRedis<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BloomFilterRedis<T>
extends BloomFilter<T>
    A persistent bloom filter backed by the Redis key message store. Internally it operates on the setbit and getbit operations of Redis. If you need to remove elements from the bloom filter, please use a counting bloom filter, e.g. CBloomFilterRedis. The performance of this datastructure is very good, as operations are grouped into fast transactions, minimizing the network overhead of all bloom filter operations to one round trip to Redis.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public BloomFilterRedis(java.lang.String host,
                int port,
                int m,
                int k)
        Creates a new persistent Bloomfilter backed by Redis.
        Parameters:
        host - the Redis host name or IP address
        port - the Redis port
        m - The size of the bloom filter in bits.
        k - The number of hash functions to use.
